name: @sylphx/zen
description: Zen state management library - extreme minimalism, extreme speed. V3: Auto-tracking reactivity, 80% smaller.

scripts.build: bunup src/zen-ultra.ts --format esm,cjs --dts --target node --minify && mv dist/zen-ultra.js dist/index.js && mv dist/zen-ultra.cjs dist/index.cjs && mv dist/zen-ultra.d.ts dist/index.d.ts && mv dist/zen-ultra.d.cts dist/index.d.cts
scripts.build:v2: bunup src/zen-optimized.ts --format esm,cjs --dts --target node --minify --out-dir dist/v2 && mv dist/v2/zen-optimized.js dist/v2/zen-v2.js && mv dist/v2/zen-optimized.cjs dist/v2/zen-v2.cjs && mv dist/v2/zen-optimized.d.ts dist/v2/zen-v2.d.ts && mv dist/v2/zen-optimized.d.cts dist/v2/zen-v2.d.cts
scripts.build:v1: bunup src/zen-v1.ts --format esm,cjs --dts --target node --minify --out-dir dist/v1 && mv dist/v1/zen-v1.js dist/v1/index.js && mv dist/v1/zen-v1.cjs dist/v1/index.cjs && mv dist/v1/zen-v1.d.ts dist/v1/index.d.ts && mv dist/v1/zen-v1.d.cts dist/v1/index.d.cts
scripts.build:all: bun run build && bun run build:v2 && bun run build:v1
scripts.compare: bun run compare:size && bun run compare:perf

author: Sylphx <hi@sylphx.com>
